name: Anim8or Script
summary: Learn about .A8S files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Anim8or scripts can be used for various purposes including scripted object modeling, importing and exporting new file formats, and adding other plug-in features to the software.

description: Script created for Anim8or, a free 3D modeling and character animation program for Windows; saved in a plain text format and contains source code written in the ASL (Anim8or Scripting Language) syntax.
